committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power
Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A bill to amend the Energy Security Act to restrict the use of foreign-produced articles, materials, and supplies in the construction of synthetic fuel projects financed or constructed by the Synthetic Fuels Corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Security Act to require that only domestically mined or manufactured materials be used in the construction of synthetic fuel projects financed or constructed by the Synthetic Fuels Corporation. Permits the use of foreign-produced materials in synthetic fuel project construction if the total cost of such materials does not exceed ten percent of the construction costs or if the President approves such usage.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Energy Security Act to restrict the use of foreign-produced articles, materials, and supplies in the construction of synthetic fuel projects financed or constructed by the Synthetic Fuels Corporation.
